title: Status bar always showing when Spotify is playing in the background
content:
When I have Spotify playing in the background. I'm finding that the top status bar doesn't disappear when I'm using another full screen app. (Any Gaming app I have tried so far). So whenever I press on the top section of the screen the notification bar will drop down over the screen. 

I have tried using these gaming apps without Spotify playing in the background and the status bar disappears automatically

 Has anyone else has experienced this issue?
